title: 외국인을 위한 설날 피자 파티(Pizza Party for International Students)
content: 한국 고유 명절인 설날을 맞이하여 학교 내 대덕 동네 피자점에서 외국인 학생 등을 위한 설날 파티를 개최 하니 많이 참석하시어 즐겨주시기 바랍니다. 1. 행사일시 : 2012. 1. 23.(월)   ○ 점심: 12:00 ~ 14:00 2. 주최 : 대덕동네 피자(DDDN) 3. 장소 : 대덕동네 피자점(W2, 1층) 4. 대 상 :    KAIST 내부 외국인 및 외부의 외국인 친구 동행가능 5. 행사내용 : 외국인들을 위한 피자, 과일을 무료 제공함 ================================================================= Celebration of 2012 Lunar New Year: Pizza Party for International Students In celebration of the upcoming lunar new year, the owner of the Dae-Deok-Dong-Nae Pizza store located in the W2 building will kindly throw a pizza party for international students and their family and friends. Please bring your beloved ones to the party and enjoy the free pizza and fruits! Details of the party follow below : 1. Event Time : Jan. 23, 2012 (Monday) ○ Lunch : 12:00 ~ 2:00 pm 2. Event Host and Place : Dae-Deok-Dong-Nae(DDDN) Pizza Store, 1st floor in W2 B/D 3. Target : Foreigners in KAIST and Foreigner's Friend 4. Contents : Free Pizza and Fruits to Foreigners
